Description:
Detects specific commands commonly used to remove or empty the syslog

Author: Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Commands to Clear or Remove the Syslog - Builtin
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (Query('rm /var/log/syslog OR rm -r /var/log/syslog OR rm -f /var/log/syslog OR rm -rf /var/log/syslog OR mv /var/log/syslog OR  >/var/log/syslog OR  > /var/log/syslog') and  not Query('/syslog.'))
